TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ViewTechnology extends System.Enum

summary.span: 定義設計工具主應用程式 (Designer Host) 所支援的技術集合的識別項。

span.span: Defines identifiers for a set of technologies that designer hosts support.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 檢視配接器模型取代，並將功能加入至功能; 不過，功能會保留回溯相容性和未來使用，如果您選擇。The view adapter model replaces and adds functionality to the feature; however, the feature is retained for both backward compatibility and future use, if you choose. 定義可以指出要用來控制的設計工具裝載的文件的顯示模式的識別項。 defines identifiers that can indicate the mode to use for controlling the display of a designer-hosted document. 您只應該在設計工具的裝載環境中使用的預設值。You should only use the Default value in your designer hosting environment. 在舊版[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]，則列舉型別指定類型的根設計工具所支援的 UI 模型。In previous versions of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)], the enumeration specified the type of UI model supported by a root designer. 因為此模型不是可延伸的則您應該改用*view 配接器*模型。Because this model is not extensible, you should instead use a *view adapter* model. 檢視配接器是調整到另一種類型的物件型別。A view adapter is a type that adapts an object of one type to another. 例如，HTML 設計工具可能會傳回`DemoDOM`其檢視和樹狀結構。For example, an HTML designer might return a `DemoDOM` tree as its view. HTML 設計工具傳回預設檢視的技術。The HTML designer returns a view technology of Default. Windows Form 裝載環境會有一或多個可用的檢視配接器類別。A Windows Forms hosting environment would have one or more view adapter classes available. 如果可以轉換一個這類類別`DemoDOM`到 Windows Form 控制項，在裝載應用程式可支援這種類型的設計工具。If one such class could convert the `DemoDOM` into a Windows Forms control, the hosting application can support this type of designer. 如果沒有配接器可以處理的設計工具所傳回的資料類型方法，設計工具載入會失敗，，而且使用者會看到錯誤。If no adapter can handle the data type returned from the designer's method, the load of the designer will fail, and the user will be presented with an error. Visual Studio 有提供檢視配接器，所以它可以適用於任何 UI 技術的可延伸配置。Visual Studio has an extensible scheme for providing view adapters, so it can adapt to any UI technology. 協力廠商技術提供者也可以提供適當的檢視配接器，其物件模型可立即使用。Third-party technology providers can also offer an appropriate view adapter, and their object models are immediately consumable. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用設計工具中的類別。The following code example demonstrates how to use the class in a designer. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分介面。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the interface. [!code-cpp[IRootDesigner Sample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IRootDesigner Sample/CPP/class1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[IRootDesigner Sample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IRootDesigner Sample/CS/class1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IRootDesigner Sample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IRootDesigner Sample/VB/class1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ComponentModel.Design.ViewTechnology Default = int32(2)

summary.span: 指定預設檢視技術的支援。

span.span: Specifies the default view technology support.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根目錄設計工具可能會傳回任何類型的物件，但此物件必須是與技術的主機介面卡相容。The root designer may return any type of object, but the object must be compatible with an adapter for the technology of the host. Visual Studio 這類的裝載環境可用來插入新的檢視技術配接器。Hosting environments such as Visual Studio provide a way to plug in new view technology adapters. 在 Windows Forms 設計工具的預設檢視物件是執行個體。The default view object for the Windows Forms designer is a instance. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用設計工具中的類別。The following code example demonstrates how to use the class in a designer. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分介面。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the interface. [!code-cpp[IRootDesigner Sample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IRootDesigner Sample/CPP/class1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[IRootDesigner Sample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IRootDesigner Sample/CS/class1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IRootDesigner Sample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IRootDesigner Sample/VB/class1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ComponentModel.Design.ViewTechnology Passthrough = int32(0)

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("This value has been deprecated. Use ViewTechnology.Default instead. http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=14202")

summary.span: 表示直接將檢視物件傳遞至開發環境的模式。

span.span: Represents a mode in which the view object is passed directly to the development environment.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 檢視物件必須實作任何開發環境所需的介面。The view object must implement any interfaces the development environment requires. Visual Studio 開發環境支援 ActiveX 控制項、 使用中文件，或該物件會實作透過 Visual Studio VSI （Visual Studio 整合） 計畫的 IVsWindowPane 介面的檢視物件。The Visual Studio development environment supports view objects that are either an ActiveX control, active document, or an object that implements the IVsWindowPane interface that is available through Visual Studio VSI (Visual Studio Integration) program. Visual Studio 開發環境會提供這個檢視技術的支援。The Visual Studio development environment provides support for this view technology. 找不到都必須在所有開發環境的這個檢視技術的支援。Support for this view technology is not necessarily available in all development environments.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ComponentModel.Design.ViewTechnology WindowsForms = int32(1)

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("This value has been deprecated. Use ViewTechnology.Default instead. http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=14202")

summary.span: 表示 Windows Form 控制項物件為主要設計工具提供顯示方式的模式。

span.span: Represents a mode in which a Windows Forms control object provides the display for the root designer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設計工具主應用程式會填入在 Windows Form 控制項中的開發環境文件視窗。The designer host fills the development environment document window with the Windows Forms control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用設計工具中的類別。The following code example demonstrates how to use the class in a designer. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[LocalizationExtenderProviderExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/LocalizationExtenderProviderExample/CPP/class1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[LocalizationExtenderProviderExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/LocalizationExtenderProviderExample/CS/class1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[LocalizationExtenderProviderExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/LocalizationExtenderProviderExample/VB/class1.vb#1)]
